Body:
blood_pressure = {'before': [148, 142, 136, 134, 138, 140, 132, 144, 128, 
    170, 162, 150, 138, 154, 126, 116], 'after': [152, 152, 134, 148, 144, 
    136, 144, 150, 146, 174, 162, 162, 146, 156, 132, 126], 'subject_id':
    np.arange(1, 17)}
exercise_bp = pd.DataFrame(blood_pressure)
ex_bp = load(data=exercise_bp, idx=('before', 'after'), paired=True, id_col
    ='subject_id')
paired_mean_diff = ex_bp.mean_diff.results
assert pytest.approx(3.875) == paired_mean_diff.bca_low[0]
assert pytest.approx(9.5) == paired_mean_diff.bca_high[0]
